title.rendered: Watch Caldwell Night Rodeo 2023 live stream CNR online

content.rendered:
Watch the action at the outdoor Caldwell Night Rodeo! The Caldwell Night Rodeo 2023 will be held on Tuesday, August 15 – Saturday, August 19 in Caldwell, Idaho. This Caldwell rodeo is held at Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena. Finals are held on Saturday night.

The Caldwell Night Rodeo is an outstanding rodeo events held in Caldwell, Idaho every year. It was the first rodeo in the Pacific Northwest to be held under lights, and since then the arena’s been lit up by many record-setting rides. Since, the rodeo has grown in size and notoriety, as it has been nominated for the PRCA’s Top Large Outdoor Rodeo seven times in the last 20 years. The rodeo was recently named one of the best rodeos in the US!

Caldwell Night Rodeo 2023
Venue Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena, Caldwell, ID
Date August 15th – 19th, 2023
Time 3:30 p.m. – 9:45 p.m. ET
Sanctions PRCA, WPRA
Broadcast TCC+/TCC

Caldwell Night Rodeo is one of the largest and longest-running annual events in Canyon County, drawing rodeo fans in excess of 45,000 over 5 action-packed nights. Listed among the Top 20 Professional Rodeos AND Top 5 Large Outdoor Rodeos in the nation, Caldwell Night Rodeo features the best professional cowboys, cowgirls and animal athletes in the world and is an annual stop on the professional rodeo tour.

When is the Caldwell Night Rodeo 2023?

For individuals who plan on attending the Caldwell Night Rodeo festivities in Caldwell, Idaho, there are a variety of sponsored activities to get involved with during the 5-day period between August 15th – 19th, 2023 – 3:30 p.m. – 9:45 p.m. (ET).

Where is the CNR 2023 held?

The CNR will be held at the Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena at Caldwell, Idaho. CNR is one of the largest annual events in Canyon County, make sure to get out to the rodeo early to watch the junior rodeo events beginning at 6:30pm. The main performance begins at 8pm.

Where is the Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds?

Caldwell, Idaho
Getting to the Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds is easy. It’s located in Caldwell, Idaho at the 2207 Blaine St Caldwell ID 83605, Caldwell, ID 83605.

What is the CNR 2023 Schedule?

Tuesday August 15th- First Responder Family Night

  • Barrel Racing Slack (1st & 2nd go): 9:00 AM
  • Cowboy Up Mercantile Shopping Hour: 4:30 PM
  • VIP Dinner Experience: 5:00 PM (pre-purchase tickets required)
  • Arena Gates Open: 5:30 PM
  • Jr Rodeo Begins: 6:30 PM
  • Pro Rodeo Begins: 7:45 PM

Wednesday August 16th- Man Up Crusade

  • Cowboy Up Mercantile Shopping Hour: 4:30 PM
  • VIP Dinner Experience: 5:00 PM (pre-purchase tickets required)
  • Arena Gates Open: 5:30 PM
  • Jr Rodeo Begins: 6:30 PM
  • Pro Rodeo Begins: 7:45 PM

Thursday August 17th- CNR Strong

  • Cowboy Up Mercantile Shopping Hour: 4:30 PM
  • VIP Dinner Experience: 5:00 PM (pre-purchase tickets required)
  • Arena Gates Open: 5:30 PM
  • Jr Rodeo Begins: 6:30 PM
  • Pro Rodeo Begins: 7:45 PM

Friday August 18th- Patriot Night

  • Cowboy Up Mercantile Shopping Hour: 4:30 PM
  • VIP Dinner Experience: 5:00 PM (pre-purchase tickets required)
  • Arena Gates Open: 5:30 PM
  • Jr Rodeo Begins: 6:30 PM
  • Pro Rodeo Begins: 7:45 PM

Saturday August 19th- Championship Night

  • Cowboy Up Mercantile Shopping Hour: 4:30 PM
  • VIP Dinner Experience: 5:00 PM (pre-purchase tickets required)
  • Arena Gates Open: 5:30 PM
  • Jr Rodeo Begins: 6:30 PM
  • Pro Rodeo Begins: 7:45 PM

What TV Channel will the CNR be on?

The entirety of the CNR main performances will air live on the The Cowboy Channel and The Cowboy Channel Plus app from August 15th – 19th, 2023 beginning at 3:30 p.m. – 9:45 p.m. ET Because this is an exclusive deal between the network and the PRCA, the Caldwell Night Rodeo 2021 will not be shown on any other TV network during the 5-day period.

CNR Main Events

  • Bareback Bronc Riding
  • Barrels
  • Bull Riding
  • Saddle Bronc Riding
  • Steer Wrestling
  • Team Roping
  • Tie Down Roping

How to watch Caldwell Night Rodeo?

For fans who are unable to attend the Caldwell, ID in August, the 5 days performances will be live streamed on the Cowboy Channel + (www.cowboyschannelplus.com). Cowboy Channel + content is available to stream in HD through Cowboy Channel + app on your favorite connected devices.

The Cowboy channel

Beginning December 27, 2017, The Cowboy Channel, the first 24-hour television network totally dedicated to western sports and the western lifestyle, will be available on DIRECTV channel 603. In addition, The Cowboy Channel can also be streamed via Sling TV’s Heartland Extra package.

The Cowboy Channel:

  • AT&T (Channel 566)
  • Charter Spectrum
  • Comcast
  • Suddenlink
  • Sling TV’s Heartland Package
  • Verizon FiOS TV
  • The Cowboy Channel Plus App

To find THE COWBOY CHANNEL are available in your area, please click here and enter your zip code also choose your Pay TV provider.

Can I watch Caldwell Night Rodeo 2023 on Roku, Fire TV, Apple TV, or Chromecast?

Good news! The Cowboy Channel offer apps that work on or with Roku, Fire TV, Apple TV, and Chromecast devices. Sling TV also has an app for Android TV, which is the streaming platform used on some Sony smart TVs, among other devices.

How much Caldwell Night Rodeo tickets costs?

  • $12.00 – $75.00: Caldwell Night Rodeo – Tuesday
  • $12.00 – $75.00: Caldwell Night Rodeo – Wednesday
  • $8.00 – $75.00: Caldwell Night Rodeo – Thursday
  • $25.00 – $80.00: Caldwell Night Rodeo – Friday
  • $25.00 – $85.00: Caldwell Night Rodeo – Saturday

For additional information visit: caldwellnightrodeo.com. For the latest Rodeo sports news visit: portal-alpha.financial-ombudsman.org.uk
